name: Gold Aftershave, Classic
description:
The subtle sent of sophistication after a shave staying with you for most of the day

How to Use

Put 2 to 3 drops on the palm of your hand and rub together.Gently Rub your hands in a downward motion from the top of your cheeks to your jawline. Then swipe each hand up your neck and under your chin.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
